title: Copper Dips Below $13,000 With Stockpiles, China Demand in Focus
description: Copper extended losses as investors focused on rising inventories and waning appetite from Chinese buyers, even after some dip-buying emerged earlier this week.
content: Copper extended losses as investors focused on rising inventories and waning appetite from Chinese buyers, even after some dip-buying emerged earlier this week.
